docs.text:
Julia Smooth Optimizers
 - 


Here you will find a collection of Julia packages for Nonlinear Optimization.
These packages provide the tools needed for creating optimization problems and
methods, but also provide access for optimization problems and methods.


See each package status 
here
.


Optimization Problems




NLPModels.jl
: Defines data structures for nonlinear
  optimization models. Includes models for user-provided functions, automatic
  differentiation, 
JuMP
 /
  
MathProgBase
 models, and the
  abstract models used by 
CUTEst.jl
 and
  
AmplNLReader.jl
.


CUTEst.jl
: Provides access to the 
Constrained and
  Unconstrained Testing Environment with safe threads (CUTEST)
 repository of
  problems. Uses 
NLPModels.jl
.


AmplNLReader.jl
: Provides access to AMPL Models.
  Uses 
NLPModels.jl
.


OptimizationProblems.jl
: Implements
  several problem in JuMP format. Can be used with
  
NLPModels
 for easy multiplatform access to problems.




Tools




Krylov.jl
: Implements Hand-Picked Krylov methods. For
  instance, Steihaug-Toint conjugate-gradient method for the minimization of a
  non-convex quadratic in a Trust-Region.


LinearOperators.jl
: Implements linear
  operators, facilitating the use of some operations (like 
Hessian-vector

  products or 
Limited BFGS
 matrices). Specially useful with Krylov methods.


Profiles.jl
: Implements performance profile for Julia.
  Uses and easy input and access the Plots library, enabling the use of various
  backends.




Methods




Optimize.jl
: Optimization Algorithms in Pure Julia.
  The focus is to provide large-scale efficient and robust methods. Uses
  
NLPModels
 for unified access to all problems above.
  Also defines tools for benchmarking and profiling codes using the same API.




Interfaces




AMD.jl
: Julia Interface to the AMD library of Amestoy,
  Davis and Duff.


HSL.jl
: Julia Interface to the HSL Mathematical Software
  Library.


MUMPS.jl
: Julia Interface to MUMPS.


PROPACK.jl
: Julia wrapper of the PROPACK sparse SVD
  library


qr_mumps.jl
: Interface to multicore QR factorization
  qr_mumps.
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
Here you will find a collection of Julia packages for Nonlinear Optimization.
These packages provide the tools needed for creating optimization problems and
methods, but also provide access for optimization problems and methods.  See each package status  here .
docs.title: Julia Smooth Optimizers -

docs.text:
NLPModels.jl : Defines data structures for nonlinear
  optimization models. Includes models for user-provided functions, automatic
  differentiation,  JuMP  /
   MathProgBase  models, and the
  abstract models used by  CUTEst.jl  and
   AmplNLReader.jl .  CUTEst.jl : Provides access to the  Constrained and
  Unconstrained Testing Environment with safe threads (CUTEST)  repository of
  problems. Uses  NLPModels.jl .  AmplNLReader.jl : Provides access to AMPL Models.
  Uses  NLPModels.jl .  OptimizationProblems.jl : Implements
  several problem in JuMP format. Can be used with
   NLPModels  for easy multiplatform access to problems.
docs.title: Optimization Problems

docs.text:
Krylov.jl : Implements Hand-Picked Krylov methods. For
  instance, Steihaug-Toint conjugate-gradient method for the minimization of a
  non-convex quadratic in a Trust-Region.  LinearOperators.jl : Implements linear
  operators, facilitating the use of some operations (like  Hessian-vector 
  products or  Limited BFGS  matrices). Specially useful with Krylov methods.  Profiles.jl : Implements performance profile for Julia.
  Uses and easy input and access the Plots library, enabling the use of various
  backends.
docs.title: Tools

docs.text:
Optimize.jl : Optimization Algorithms in Pure Julia.
  The focus is to provide large-scale efficient and robust methods. Uses
   NLPModels  for unified access to all problems above.
  Also defines tools for benchmarking and profiling codes using the same API.
docs.title: Methods

docs.text:
AMD.jl : Julia Interface to the AMD library of Amestoy,
  Davis and Duff.  HSL.jl : Julia Interface to the HSL Mathematical Software
  Library.  MUMPS.jl : Julia Interface to MUMPS.  PROPACK.jl : Julia wrapper of the PROPACK sparse SVD
  library  qr_mumps.jl : Interface to multicore QR factorization
  qr_mumps.
docs.title: Interfaces

docs.text:
This is a brief list of the installed packages and their situation.
For help, check the docs of each package,
  
gitter
 for
  anyone online, or open an issue on GitHub


AMD.jl 


Approximate Minimum Degree Ordering in Julia




 


 


 




AmplNLReader.jl 


Julia AMPL Models Conforming to NLPModels.jl




 
 


 
 


 
 




CUTEst.jl 


Julia's CUTEst Interface




 
 


 
 






HSL.jl 


Julia interface to the HSL Mathematical Software Library




 


 




Krylov.jl 


A Julia Basket of Hand-Picked Krylov Methods




 
 


 
 


 
 




LinearOperators.jl 


Linear Operators for Julia




 
 


 
 




MUMPS.jl 


A Julia Interface to MUMPS




 
 


 
 




NLPModels.jl 


Data Structures for Optimization Models




 
 


 
 


 
 






OptimizationProblems.jl 


Optimization Problems for Julia




 


 


 




Optimize.jl 


Optimization Algorithms in Pure Julia




 


 


 




Profiles.jl 


Performance and data profiles




 


 


 




PROPACK.jl 


Julia wrapper of the PROPACK sparse SVD library




 


 


 




qr_mumps.jl 


Interface to multicore QR factorization qr_mumps
